resources.string: Besides the basic features of a calculator, our app also contains a scientific calculator and a multi-purpose converter. Some features need to connect to the internet to work normally. You must read and agree to our %1$s and %2$s before using Calculator.
How do you feel about Calculator?
Could you give us your feedback as well?
Nice! Rate Calculator in App Store as well?
"Couldn't connect to the network. Tap here to try again."
Downloaded settings successfully. Launch Calculator again to apply.
Data provided by hexun.com and East Money
